Text: Great video of a very inspiring man! Thanks so much for sharing it.  I would love to see more of this guy in action.  Will insipre many woodworkers.

Unfortunately, Sam Maloof passed away last year at the ripe young age of 92.  If you ever had the chance to meet the man you would have known that you were in the company of greatness.  His museum and home in Alta Loma, CA are open daily for tours and his shop still produces the classics that made Maloof famous.
Thanks for the upload, it definitely contains some good information, but why is a 320x240, medium quality video over 2 gigs in size?
Video size and quality is good, over 8 hours (!) in length.
